item.title: How do i make a command ::hide?
item.dc:creator: @s3rv3r s3rv3r
item.description:
@s3rv3r wrote:

Add this under client.java then ctrl+f then type in end of frame you should see //END OF FRAME// something like that then add the commad under that

[quote=“Pur3 Mag3, post:4, topic:68931”]Add this with your other commands:

if (command.startsWith("hide") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("YOURNAMEHERE")) { sendMessage("Other players can no longer see you, type ::show to reverse this command."); pHead=-100; pBeard=-100; pTorso=-100; pArms=-100; pHands=-100; pLegs=-100; pFeet=-100; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } if (command.startsWith("show") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("YOURNAMEHERE")) { sendMessage("Other players can now see you once again, type ::hide to reverse this command."); pHead=3; pBeard=19; pTorso=19; pArms=29; pHands=35; pLegs=39; pFeet=44; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }[/quote]

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make a command ::hide?

item.title: How do i make a command ::hide?
item.dc:creator: @Pur3_Mag3 Pur3 Mag3
item.description:
@Pur3_Mag3 wrote:

Add this with your other commands:

if (command.startsWith("hide") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("YOURNAMEHERE")) { sendMessage("Other players can no longer see you, type ::show to reverse this command."); pHead=-100; pBeard=-100; pTorso=-100; pArms=-100; pHands=-100; pLegs=-100; pFeet=-100; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } if (command.startsWith("show") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("YOURNAMEHERE")) { sendMessage("Other players can now see you once again, type ::hide to reverse this command."); pHead=3; pBeard=19; pTorso=19; pArms=29; pHands=35; pLegs=39; pFeet=44; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

Just change YOURNAMEHERE to your name. If you want to let everyone use it take out the && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("YOURNAMEHERE")

There

Read full topic
